title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: Foundational Course on Predicting Molecular Subtypes of Bladder Cancer

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain molecular subtype classification criteria and clinical significance of bladder cancer
Learners understand the correlation between digital pathology images and artificial intelligence analysis technologies
Learners can explain the process of utilizing morphological features extracted from H&E-stained slides for molecular subtype prediction

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
